testcase.classname: Test login functionality of Orange HRM
testcase.name: Test login fuctionality with valid username with valid password
testcase.system-out: Given as a user we launch the particular url "https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com/".passed When as a user we send the username "Admin" and password "admin123".........passed And as a user we click the login button.....................................passed Then as a user we verifies title and url of the Orange HRM..................passed
